text: Old Yeller is a 1957 Walt Disney movie. It stars Tommy Kirk, Fess Parker, Kevin Corcoran, Dorothy McGuire, and 'Spike'. It is based on the book of the same name by Fred Gipson. The movie is about a boy and a stray dog in post- Civil War Texas. A sequel called Savage Sam followed in 1958. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:Movies about dogs Category:Movies about rabies Category:Movies based on books Category:1957 drama movies Category:1950s family movies Category:English-language movies Category:Disney movies
title: Old Yeller (movie)
